string-array.name: Description
string-array.item: Planks are a great core stabilizing exercise.
The side plank is the same concept as the front plank
For starters, get in a kneeling push up position
Lay flat on your back with your arms extended out on the ground
There are many ways to change up lying leg raises to keep the routine
A variation of the leg raise but instead of laying down
Similar in motion to standing Russian twists, this movement can be performed with a cable machine
